name: Anatomy
description: Study of the structure of the human body and its parts

name: Physiology
description: Study of normal functioning of the human body and its systems

name: Biochemistry
description: Study of chemical processes and substances in the human body

name: Pathology
description: Study of diseases and their causes, processes, development, and consequences

name: Microbiology
description: Study of microorganisms and their effects on human health

name: Pharmacology
description: Study of drugs and their effects on living systems

name: Forensic Medicine
description: Application of medical knowledge to legal issues

name: Medicine
description: Comprehensive study of diagnosis, treatment and prevention of diseases

name: Surgery
description: Study of operative procedures and treatment of diseases and injuries

name: Obstetrics & Gynecology
description: Study of female reproductive system, pregnancy and childbirth

name: Pediatrics
description: Medical care of infants, children and adolescents

name: Psychiatry
description: Study and treatment of mental disorders

name: Dermatology
description: Study of skin and its diseases

name: Orthopedics
description: Diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the musculoskeletal system

name: Radiology
description: Use of imaging technologies for diagnosis and treatment

name: Anesthesiology
description: Study and practice of pain relief during surgery

name: Ophthalmology
description: Study and treatment of eye disorders

name: ENT
description: Study and treatment of ear, nose and throat disorders

name: Community Medicine
description: Study of health and disease in populations and communities
